item.description:
Lets celebrate India's Republic Day and take an opportunity to socialze and meet with friends and more important dance and be merry!!

Â 

On Saturday, January 26th, 2013- come out to JAI HO!! Honoring one of India's pride & son, Oscar Winner - A.R. Rehman for his contributionin music to the bollywood and hollywood move industry from Jai ho!, Aaa Maa Tujhe Salaam to Bombay Dreams!! Live DJ will play today's hottest Shahrukh Khan, Salman Khan numbers mixed in with some old school popular from Amitabh, Rajesh Khanna hits!! Night to be remembered..get ready to dance!!

It's all happening at Brighton Beer Garden, 386 Market Street. Wearing indian colors = Orange, Blue, Green is encouraged and gets you reduced entry all night long! RSVP and cc: and send email to five other friends and get in FREE before 11pm. Students get in reduced with Student ID all night long.

Entry: $10 before 12pm with RSVP. $15 otherwise.

Get your tickets for guaranteed entry or RSVP by emailing at "Generationdesi@gmail.com" for reduced entry before 12am.

Ladies you get in FREE before 11:30pm with RSVP. Remember to RSVP by emailing at "Generationdesi@gmail.com"

RSVP and cc: 5 friends and "Generationdesi@gmail.com" to get in on the FREE list before midnight.

Wear Indian colors: Orange, Blue, Green to get in Reduced Entry all night long!
item.name: Jai Ho! India Republic Day Bhangra Bollywood Dance Party
